summary: This document is an email chain from November 10, 2020, forwarding a letter to Audrey Strauss. It involves Jennifer Freeman of Marsh Law Firm PLLC communicating with a U.S. Attorney's Office contractor, with the email containing confidentiality notices and a forwarded attachment.

persons.name: Jennifer Freeman
persons.role: Attorney at Marsh Law Firm PLLC
persons.context: She sends an email with an attached letter to Audrey Strauss, marked as confidential and subject to attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: She is the recipient of a forwarded letter attached to the email, indicating legal correspondence directed to her office.

connections.description: Jennifer Freeman sends a letter to Audrey Strauss, indicating professional legal communication between an attorney and a U.S. Attorney.

events.title: Email forwarding letter to Audrey Strauss
events.description: An email is sent forwarding a letter to U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss, with confidentiality notices and legal disclaimers attached.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated November 10, 2020, involving legal correspondence to U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss.
Jennifer Freeman of Marsh Law Firm PLLC sends the email with a confidential attachment, indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
The email includes a confidentiality notice and disclaimer that it does not establish legal representation unless explicitly stated.
